nofap.title: Day 1: Acknowledge the Shadow
nofap.description: Understanding your triggers and acknowledging your starting point.
nofap.challenge_text: Write down 3 situations that trigger your craving. Be honest about your current state.

nofap.title: Day 2: The Foundation
nofap.description: Building awareness and setting your intention.
nofap.challenge_text: Create a morning routine that includes 5 minutes of meditation or deep breathing.
nofap.success_criteria: Complete morning routine + log your mood

nofap.title: Day 3: Identify Patterns
nofap.description: Recognizing your behavioral patterns and triggers.
nofap.challenge_text: Track your energy levels and mood throughout the day. Note when you feel most vulnerable.
nofap.success_criteria: Complete energy tracking + identify 2 vulnerable times

nofap.title: Day 4: The Substitution
nofap.description: Learning to replace the habit with healthier alternatives.
nofap.challenge_text: When you feel a craving, do 20 push-ups or take a cold shower instead.
nofap.success_criteria: Complete substitution exercise + log the experience

nofap.title: Day 5: The Accountability
nofap.challenge_text: Tell one trusted person about your journey. Ask them to check in with you daily.
nofap.success_criteria: Share your goal + establish accountability partner

nofap.title: Day 6: The Environment
nofap.description: Creating a supportive environment for success.
nofap.challenge_text: Remove or block all triggers from your devices and living space.

nofap.title: Day 7: The First Week
nofap.description: Celebrating your first week and reflecting on progress.
nofap.challenge_text: Write a letter to your future self about why you're doing this and what you hope to achieve.

nofap.title: Day 8: The Routine
nofap.challenge_text: Create a structured daily schedule that includes work, exercise, and leisure time.
nofap.success_criteria: Create schedule + follow it for one day

nofap.title: Day 9: The Social Connection
nofap.description: Building meaningful relationships and social support.
nofap.challenge_text: Reach out to a friend or family member and have a meaningful conversation.
nofap.success_criteria: Make social connection + log the interaction

nofap.title: Day 10: The Milestone
nofap.description: Reaching your first major milestone and building momentum.
nofap.challenge_text: Reflect on your progress and write down 3 positive changes you've noticed.

sugar.title: Day 1: The Sweet Truth
sugar.description: Understanding your sugar consumption and its impact.
sugar.challenge_text: Track everything you eat today and identify all sources of added sugar.
sugar.success_criteria: Complete food log + identify 5+ sugar sources

sugar.title: Day 2: The Clean Start
sugar.description: Beginning your sugar-free journey with intention.
sugar.challenge_text: Start your day with a protein-rich breakfast and avoid all added sugars.
sugar.success_criteria: Eat clean breakfast + avoid added sugars

sugar.title: Day 3: The Cravings
sugar.description: Learning to manage sugar cravings effectively.
sugar.challenge_text: When you crave sugar, drink a glass of water and wait 10 minutes before deciding.

sugar.title: Day 4: The Substitution
sugar.description: Finding healthy alternatives to satisfy your sweet tooth.
sugar.challenge_text: Replace one sugary snack with a piece of fruit or nuts.
sugar.success_criteria: Make healthy substitution + log the experience

sugar.title: Day 5: The Energy
sugar.description: Understanding how sugar affects your energy levels.
sugar.challenge_text: Track your energy levels throughout the day and note any crashes.

sugar.title: Day 6: The Hydration
sugar.description: Using proper hydration to reduce sugar cravings.
sugar.challenge_text: Drink 8 glasses of water today and notice how it affects your cravings.

sugar.title: Day 7: The First Week
sugar.challenge_text: Reflect on how you feel without sugar and write down 3 positive changes.

sugar.title: Day 8: The Meal Prep
sugar.description: Preparing healthy meals to avoid sugar temptations.
sugar.challenge_text: Prepare 3 healthy, sugar-free meals for the next day.
sugar.success_criteria: Meal prep 3 meals + avoid added sugars

sugar.title: Day 9: The Social Challenge
sugar.challenge_text: Attend a social event and choose sugar-free options.
sugar.success_criteria: Navigate social event + choose healthy options

sugar.title: Day 10: The Milestone
sugar.description: Reaching your first major milestone in the sugar-free journey.
sugar.challenge_text: Celebrate your progress and plan your next 10 days.

shopping.title: Day 1: The Audit
shopping.description: Understanding your current spending habits and triggers.
shopping.challenge_text: Review your last month's bank statements and categorize all purchases.

shopping.title: Day 2: The Pause
shopping.description: Learning to pause before making purchases.
shopping.challenge_text: Before any purchase today, wait 24 hours and ask yourself if you really need it.

shopping.title: Day 3: The Budget
shopping.description: Creating a realistic budget for your needs and wants.
shopping.challenge_text: Create a monthly budget that includes savings and limits discretionary spending.

shopping.title: Day 4: The Unsubscribe
shopping.description: Removing temptations from your digital environment.
shopping.challenge_text: Unsubscribe from all shopping emails and delete shopping apps from your phone.
shopping.success_criteria: Remove digital temptations + unsubscribe from emails

shopping.title: Day 5: The List
shopping.description: Creating a wishlist system to delay gratification.
shopping.challenge_text: Create a wishlist of items you want and review it after 7 days.

shopping.title: Day 6: The Alternative
shopping.description: Finding free or low-cost alternatives to shopping.
shopping.challenge_text: Find 3 free activities to do instead of shopping when you feel the urge.

shopping.title: Day 7: The First Week
shopping.description: Reflecting on your first week of controlled spending.
shopping.challenge_text: Calculate how much money you saved this week and plan how to use it.

shopping.title: Day 8: The Savings
shopping.description: Building a savings habit to replace shopping.
shopping.challenge_text: Transfer the amount you would have spent shopping into a savings account.
shopping.success_criteria: Transfer money to savings + log the amount

shopping.title: Day 9: The Social
shopping.challenge_text: Attend a social event and stick to your budget without feeling deprived.
shopping.success_criteria: Navigate social event + stay within budget

shopping.title: Day 10: The Milestone
shopping.description: Celebrating your first major milestone in financial control.
shopping.challenge_text: Review your progress and set a new financial goal for the next month.

smoking_vaping.title: Day 1: The Decision
smoking_vaping.description: Making the firm decision to quit and understanding your motivation.
smoking_vaping.challenge_text: Write down 5 reasons why you want to quit and read them whenever you feel tempted.

smoking_vaping.title: Day 2: The Preparation
smoking_vaping.description: Preparing your environment and support system for success.
smoking_vaping.challenge_text: Remove all smoking/vaping materials from your home and car.

smoking_vaping.title: Day 3: The Replacement
smoking_vaping.description: Finding healthy alternatives to replace the habit.
smoking_vaping.challenge_text: When you feel the urge, chew gum, drink water, or do deep breathing instead.

smoking_vaping.title: Day 4: The Support
smoking_vaping.description: Building a support network to help you through the process.
smoking_vaping.challenge_text: Tell 3 people about your decision to quit and ask for their support.
smoking_vaping.success_criteria: Share your goal + establish support network

smoking_vaping.title: Day 5: The Triggers
smoking_vaping.description: Identifying and managing your smoking triggers.
smoking_vaping.challenge_text: List your top 5 smoking triggers and create a plan for each one.

smoking_vaping.title: Day 6: The Routine
smoking_vaping.description: Changing your daily routine to avoid smoking situations.
smoking_vaping.challenge_text: Modify your daily routine to avoid places and times when you usually smoke.

smoking_vaping.title: Day 7: The First Week
smoking_vaping.challenge_text: Reflect on how you feel physically and mentally after one week.

smoking_vaping.title: Day 8: The Cravings
smoking_vaping.description: Learning to ride out cravings without giving in.
smoking_vaping.challenge_text: When you have a craving, use the 5-minute rule: wait 5 minutes before deciding.

smoking_vaping.title: Day 9: The Social
smoking_vaping.challenge_text: Attend a social event and practice being around others who smoke without joining them.

smoking_vaping.title: Day 10: The Milestone
smoking_vaping.description: Reaching your first major milestone in the smoke-free journey.
smoking_vaping.challenge_text: Calculate how much money you've saved and plan how to use it.

social_media.title: Day 1: The Awareness
social_media.description: Understanding your current social media usage and its impact.
social_media.challenge_text: Track how much time you spend on social media today and note how you feel after each session.
social_media.success_criteria: Track usage time + log emotional impact

social_media.title: Day 2: The Boundaries
social_media.description: Setting clear boundaries for your social media use.
social_media.challenge_text: Set specific times when you can use social media and stick to them.

social_media.title: Day 3: The Removal
social_media.description: Removing social media apps from your phone to reduce temptation.
social_media.challenge_text: Delete social media apps from your phone and use only the web version.
social_media.success_criteria: Remove apps + use web version only

social_media.title: Day 4: The Alternative
social_media.description: Finding meaningful activities to replace social media time.
social_media.challenge_text: Spend the time you would have used on social media doing something productive or enjoyable.
social_media.success_criteria: Replace social media time + engage in alternative activity

social_media.title: Day 5: The Connection
social_media.description: Building real-world connections to replace virtual ones.
social_media.challenge_text: Reach out to a friend or family member in person or by phone instead of social media.
social_media.success_criteria: Make real connection + avoid social media

social_media.title: Day 6: The Mindfulness
social_media.description: Practicing mindfulness to reduce the need for constant stimulation.
social_media.challenge_text: Practice 10 minutes of meditation or mindfulness when you feel the urge to check social media.
social_media.success_criteria: Practice mindfulness + resist social media urge

social_media.title: Day 7: The First Week
social_media.description: Reflecting on your first week with reduced social media usage.
social_media.challenge_text: Write about how you feel without constant social media access and what you've accomplished.

social_media.title: Day 8: The Focus
social_media.description: Improving your focus and productivity without social media distractions.
social_media.challenge_text: Complete a task that requires deep focus without checking social media.

social_media.title: Day 9: The Social
social_media.description: Navigating social situations without relying on social media.
social_media.challenge_text: Attend a social event and be fully present without posting about it.

social_media.title: Day 10: The Milestone
social_media.description: Celebrating your first major milestone in the social media detox journey.
social_media.challenge_text: Reflect on how your relationships and productivity have improved.
